header_text: You are at a sports game. The crowd is cheering loudly for your team, and your head is pounding. You feel worried.

elements.Text: Are you worried that the pounding in your head signifies something serious?

elements.name: You are at a sports game. The crowd is cheering loudly for your team, and your head is pounding. You feel worried._Physical Health_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
